review: Slow to load compared to our Apple TV, not very intuitive remote commands, and worst of all, EVERY time I turn the tv back on to watch I get a blank grey screen. I have tried all the troubleshooting suggestions with no avail - the only solution I've found is go unplug the power to it. Super bummed about this product.

review: I absolutely love my Fire TV stick! I have owned several Roku's and recently purchased an Apple TV in order to access HBO Now. My favorite device between them all is this simple and powerful device. The streaming quality that this product provides outperforms all of the other devices I own because Amazon managed to pack 4x the storage and 2x the memory.
